entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
